website_summaries.verdict: The variety of pockets and stretchy fabric make this jacket particularly suitable for those who work outside.
pros: Looks good and has a nice lining
Features two large inner pockets and three outer pockets with concealed zippers
cons: Sleeves may be a little long
Some say the jacket is a bit stiff

customer_reviews.title: Simply the perfect soft shell jacket for me.
customer_reviews.text: I am about as picky as they come when it comes to clothes. I often spend way too much money to find something that fits just the way I need it to and looks good. I hate unnecessary logos and designs. This jacket is perfect. The large fits as it should. It looks good. This jacket can be used at work or any outdoor activities without looking out of place. I took a chance on this brand and price range (less than I normally spend). I am so glad I did. I just ordered a smaller one for my son after he approved mine.
customer_reviews.author: B. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Best winter “shell” jacket made!
customer_reviews.text: Had one with a Lincoln logo given to me by a red lap sales rep. Loved it so much that I got a plain one since I can not wear a Lincoln Jacket to work. My brother has a North Face I tried and the Red Kap is far superior.
customer_reviews.author: Public Enemy #1

customer_reviews.title: Wow. My husband looks nice in this.
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is such a good value. The X-Large fits my 6'2" 220 lb husband nicely, but it is sleek and no extra room. The lining is perfect for cold weather.
customer_reviews.author: MelW

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my husband for Christmas. Arrived in time, packaged well. Jacket is well made, and fits him perfect. No hanging sleeves, and zips over his stomach with no pulling. Has inside pockets, fleece lining and is water repellant. I would recommend buying this if your looking for quality and overall good looking for a jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Buddysmom03

customer_reviews.title: One impressive well made Shell Jacket!
customer_reviews.text: WOW! The problem with online clothes shopping is you can't really tell material qualities like texture and weight. This jacket arrived, fit like a glove, FAR exceeded my expectations, its quality made and will take me into winter. In fact when layering, will be an option on winter days that are not below freezing. May be the most impressive online clothing purchase I have made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent jacket! Fit exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Excellent jacket! Fit exactly as described. Bought it for a fairly picky, very tall, large man. He loves it. It's good looking, lots of pockets, is light but protects from rain and wind and isn't noisy with his movement. I couldn't be happier. Will DEFINITELY buy Red Kap as often as possible.
customer_reviews.author: Marlowe

customer_reviews.title: Super High Quality Jacket
customer_reviews.text: Great windbreaker.... lots of pockets. Very warm for the weight. Be careful, sizes run on the big size- I normally wear a large jacket, but had to opt for the med.
customer_reviews.author: J. Michael

customer_reviews.title: ALWAYS SATISFIED WITH REDKAP!
customer_reviews.text: EXCELLENT FIT! EXCELLENT MATERIAL. NO LOGO PERFECT FOR ADDING YOUR COMPANY LOGO, ALWAYS SATISFIED WITH REDKAP PRODUCTS!
customer_reviews.author: Vdubnluvn

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket
customer_reviews.text: Much nicer than expected. Plenty of room for a Hoodia underneath when layering. Well made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome jacket
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my husband, and he loves it. The jacket is classier than an every day zip up fleece and can be "dressed up" or "dressed down."
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Runs a bit small
customer_reviews.text: Good jacket, but runs pretty small and is a bit stiff
customer_reviews.author: ChristianDT

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket for mild winters.
customer_reviews.text: Well made, decent looking and a great price! Shell really cuts the wind.
customer_reviews.author: Paul D. Lorenz

customer_reviews.title: Very nice look with inside pockets also
customer_reviews.text: Very nice look with inside pockets also. I choose an XL but I think a Large size would have been more fitted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: We have purchased this item before. The fit was as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Keeps the wind and cold off me.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great jacket! Light weight, yet very warm, just what I was looking for! Great price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy it because you need a jacket, not a logo.
customer_reviews.text: I wear Red Cap uniforms at work so I know that anything they make is going to last a long time. I bought this for casual wear and it look great. The fit is a little boxy at the bottom, not tapered. Good if you have a larger waist or like a modern look. Cuffs have two snap positions, no knit or elastic. Bungee at the bottom hem if you need to keep out the wind. Pockets are large, warm. Great value, just no high profile logo.
customer_reviews.author: Coat buying husband

customer_reviews.title: Dig It!
customer_reviews.text: I am pretty picky about my clothing. I disdain logos and like a smooth polished look. I looked at North Face soft shells thought they were too heavy for daily wear and they have those ridiculous back shoulder logos. This is really lightweight and is truly soft shell material.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley I. Reichel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: Husband wears a size 2X. I purchased 2X, and it has room for layering. It is very well-made and the quality is excellent. The black looks good for casual and more dressy occasions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Jacket. Yes I would buy another one just ...
customer_reviews.text: Great Jacket .Yes I would buy another one just wish the sleeves could tighten a little more.
customer_reviews.author: JBean

customer_reviews.title: A true soft shell jacket without advertising on the chest
customer_reviews.text: Found this jacket through Grainger, and outfitted our property management team in black jackets with our company logo embroidered on the chest. Red Kap has a winner here! A true soft shell jacket for work or everyday wear. I highly recommend this jacket if you're looking for a warm three season jacket in either Navy or Black. Now if Red Kap would make a vest in this design, I'd be tickled as would my team.
customer_reviews.author: WaterMark

product_meta.title: Red Kap Men's Soft Shell Jacket
product_meta.description: This soft shell work jacket is qualified to give you solid protection from the elements without restricting your movement. It's made of comfortable four-way stretch fabric that allows you to maneuver and move with ease and lined with cozy fleece. This soft shell work jacket resists the effects of wind and water, keeping you dry and warm. Because of this work jacket's easy movement and protection, it's great for jobs in transportation, maintenance, construction, waste management and any other outside job. This work jacket's wind and water resistance, plus hand pockets and a napoleon chest pocket that keep your items securely zipped inside, take care of you while you take care of your job.
feature_bullets: Made in the USA or Imported
Full zip front with zipper garage
Napolean pocket with concealed zipper closure, two lower on-seam pockets with concealed zipper closures, two interior pockets
